New Records: San Francisco rookie Grant McCray homered twice and drove in five runs as the Giants beat the Padres 6-3 on September 7, 2024.
Key Match Events: Grant McCray homered twice, including a 425-foot shot in the bottom of the 9th inning, to secure the Giants' victory with a final score of 6-3.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game took place at Petco Park in San Diego, California, with an attendance of 43,318 fans.
